long_description: Designed for optimum water displacement, the Aqua Bound Bilge Master pumps 1 gal. of water in just 8 strokes. Comfortable T-grip handle is ergonomically shaped to reduce fatigue. High-density foam sleeve provides flotation. Durable construction with stainless-steel piston rod. High-density rubber valve system offers a tight seal and increased efficiency. Removable inlet cover allows you to clean out any debris. Spout snugly fits a standard 1 in. diameter water hose. Eyelet lets you tie pump to kayak during rough conditions. Bright orange color of the Aqua Bound Bilge Master pump offers high visibility.
short_description: Designed for optimum water displacement, the Aqua Bound Bilge Master pumps 1 gal. of water in just 8 strokes.
